name: Space Clicker (Frontier+) (Frontier+) (Frontier+)
description:
Idle space clicker game thingamajigger dude.

Convert hyperdrive cores in inventory into starships launched or some shit like that.

How to Play

Click the left button to do awesome shit. Click the right button to automate awesome shit. If you don't know what you're doing, you need to just die. Go big or go home.

Comments and ratings have been turned off for your own protection. All hail the new fascist world empire!
